name: Monster Scout
description:
Monster Scout is a soccer game with a focus on scouting. You become a coach in the world of monster soccer, going on reconnaissance missions and scouting monsters.

Players have unique characteristics, but just like in the real world, these traits aren't immediately apparent. Trust your scouting instincts and manage your team accordingly.

The fate of your team depends on your discerning eye! Find strong players and scout them for your team!

Players have various personalities, such as being fast runners, being good at passing, or being skilled at dribbling. However, you can't see these statuses as numerical values. You have no choice but to attend matches multiple times and find the players your team needs. Compare the player's contract money with the team's financial strength and scout strong players!

During the match, the players move on their own. All you can do is coach, such as arranging players and swapping them with the bench. Be sure to enjoy the realistic feeling of being a coach!
